attributes.action: make law that the Ministries and Regulatory Authorities set up like call centres blocking access to those in charge  give  discretionary issues to a designated official , full time not on a remit to urgently resolve
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That issues, not process, dictated by solecorprate directors,  should take precedence and individual oral case studies should be used [ with correct written recording [ signed by both parties] until resolved 
 PAs & Admin  should not be sending issues for management such as intervention [ MP]  to those restricted by remits such as Complaints & Managers in Offices and Call centres.Or blaming and cutting off [ such as Ombudsmen]  to protect their backs.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
